message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $95?

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product at this price.
